About This Page

The "Forget Last Search" page displays whether the action to clear the users previous search was successful or not.

It makes use of the following tag:

  • Super_Search:Forget_Last_Search to display whether the action to clear the users previous search was successful or not.

This specific column (on the right), uses the following tag:

  • Super_Search:History to display a list of recent saved searches for the logged in user.
